name: Pumpkin (puppetmasta4life)
description:
I'm proud of this one. I really am. I think it is because I learned from the first game and the overall process of making this one was smoother and less stressful. 

Anyway, I hope whoever sees this gets to play and enjoy this game. A lot of love went into this one. And expect the third one that I make to be 100 times better.

Here are all of my links. 

https://campsite.bio/puppetmasta4life
